pageContent: Objectives: To evaluate whether the relationship between sexual desire and quality of life (QOL) is moderated by sexual functioning in 91 men who had received treatment for localized prostate cancer within the past 18 months.

metaData.source:
Racial Disparities in Sexual Dysfunction Outcomes After Prostate Cancer Treatment: Myth or Reality?
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/26896115/
